name: 查利·戈登
introduction: Charlie Gordon is a British actor known for Matilda (Netflix Film 2022), School of Rock (Katie, Really Useful Group - Gillian Lynne Theatre), Nutcracker (English National Ballet, London Coliseum), Good Night Mr Tom (Tower Theatre) and Virtual Insanity (web series). Charlie has written and directed several short films and is a multi instrumentalist, singer/songwriter. Charlie is also a member of the 28 Dance Company.
